attributes.action: Give Elderly Care Home Residents Income Tax Deductions On Thier Care Home Fees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When elderly people (who have paid TAX all of their lives) cannot manage to live in their own home and have to go into care. They are burdened with very high fees for their Care Homes and have to fund these fees from existing savings and pensions from which income tax is deducted, even though they struggle to pay their Care Home fees of between £500 and £800 a week. Give the elderly a break, a tax break!
